gobblin.data.management.copy

Class CopySource

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<java.lang.String,FileAwareInputStream>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gobblin.source.Source<java.lang.String,FileAwareInputStream>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloseableFsCopySource

    public class CopySource
extends gobblin.source.extractor.extract.AbstractSource<java.lang.String,FileAwareInputStream>
    Source that generates work units from CopyableDatasets.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkunits

        public java.util.List<gobblin.source.workunit.WorkUnit> getWorkunits(gobblin.configuration.SourceState state)
          Does the following:
        • Instantiate a DatasetFinder.
        • Find all Dataset using DatasetFinder.
        • For each CopyableDataset get all CopyableFiles.
        • Create a WorkUnit per CopyableFile.

        In this implementation, one workunit is created for every CopyableFile found. But the extractor/converters and writers are built to support multiple CopyableFiles per workunit

        Parameters:
        state - see SourceState
        Returns:
        Work units for copying files.

      • getExtractor
